block.l: //キャンバスをテクスチャとする例 var imagecanvas = document.createElement('canvas'), imagecontext = imagecanvas.getContext('2d'); console.log(imagecanvas); document.body.appendChild(imagecanvas); imagecanvas.width = 256; imagecanvas.height = 256; // クリップする円の位置と半径を指定する imagecontext.beginPath(); imagecontext.arc(175, 175, 175, 0, Math.PI*2, false); imagecontext.clip(); // 画像を用意する var img4 = new Image(); img4.src = "textures/earth.jpg"; img4.onload = function(){ imagecontext.drawImage(img4, 160, 0, 256, 256, 0, 0, 256, 256); // Textureとして指定する．以下Three.jsでよくあるオブジェクト描画と同じ var imagetexture = new THREE.Texture(imagecanvas); imagetexture.needsUpdate = true; var imagematerial = new THREE.SpriteMaterial( { map: imagetexture, color: 0xffffff } ); var imagesprite = new THREE.Sprite( imagematerial ); imagesprite.scale.set(200, 200, 200); imagesprite.position.set(0, 0, 0); scene.add( imagesprite ); }

//キャンバスをテクスチャとする例２ var canvas = document.createElement('canvas'), ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = 256; canvas.height = 256; // document.body.appendChild(canvas); // 画像を用意する var img = new Image(); img.src = "textures/earth.jpg"; img.onload = function(){ ctx.drawImage(img, 160, 0, 256, 256, 0, 0, 256, 256); // Textureとして指定する．以下Three.jsでよくあるオブジェクト描画と同じ var texture = new THREE.Texture(canvas); texture.needsUpdate = true; var material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial( {map : texture,color: 0xffffff } ); var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(2,2,2); var obj = new THREE.Mesh(geometry,material); scene.add( obj ); }

container.addEventListener( 'mousemove', onMouseMove, false ); function onMouseMove( event ) { var rect = container.getBoundingClientRect(); x = event.clientX - rect.left; y = event.clientY - rect.top; console.log(x+","+y); }

//キャンバスをテクスチャとする例3 //var canvas = sprite.costume; var canvas = document.getElementById("world"); console.log(canvas); //var canvas = document.createElement("canvas"); var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d"); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(20, 40, 50, 50); ctx.fillStyle = "#FF0000"; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); console.log(canvas); // Textureとして指定する．以下Three.jsでよくあるオブジェクト描画と同じ var texture = new THREE.Texture(canvas); texture.needsUpdate = true; var material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial( {map : texture ,color: 0xffffff } ); var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(2,2,2); var obj = new THREE.Mesh(geometry,material); scene.add( obj );

inputs.input: ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー 照明の設定 カメラの設定 オブジェクトの設定

block-definition.s: // %'comment'
カメラの位置を %'x' %'y' %'z' にする

block-definition.s: カメラを %'value' 歩前に進める

custom-block.s: %txt の位置を %txt ずつ変える

block.l: var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); camera.getWorldDirection(v); camera.translateX(vec.x*d); camera.translateY(vec.y*d); camera.translateZ(vec.z*d);

block-definition.s: カメラの向きを %'obj' に向ける
照明（点光源） 強さ: %'val' % 距離: %'val2'

block.l: var light = new THREE.PointLight(0xffffff,val*0.01,val2,2); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 2048; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 2048; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 照明（平行） 強さ: %'val' %

block.l: var light = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,val*0.01); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 4096; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 4096; light.shadow.camera.near = 1; light.shadow.camera.far = 200; light.shadow.camera.top = 100; light.shadow.camera.bottom = -100; light.shadow.camera.right = 100; light.shadow.camera.left = -100; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 照明（環境） 強さ： %'強さ' %

block.l: var light = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff); light.color.multiplyScalar(fac/100); scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 照明（スポット）

block.l: var light = new THREE.SpotLight(0xffffff); light.target.position.set(0,-1,0); light.position.set(0, 0, 0); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 512; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 512; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 形状（立方体） サイズ: %'x' %'y' %'z'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry( _x, _y, _z ); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#FFFFFF" }); var cube = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); cube.castShadow = true; cube.receiveShadow = true; scene.add(cube); return cube;

block-definition.s: 形状（球体） 半径： %'r'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; //obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: 形状（トーラス） 半径： %'r' 太さ： %'t'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.TorusGeometry( r, t, 16 ,32); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#ffffff" }); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: 形状（collada） url: %'url'

block.l: colladaLoader.load(url,function(result){ dae = result.scene; dae.name = "collada"; console.log(dae); mesh = dae.children[1]; mesh.castShadow = true; mesh.receiveShadow = true; scene.add(dae); });

block-definition.s: 線（多角形） %'vartex'

block.l: var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

block-definition.s: 線（円） 半径： %'r'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); for(i=0;i<65;i++){ geometry.vertices.push(new THREE.Vector3(r*Math.sin(i*3.14/32),0,r*Math.cos(i*3.14/32))); } var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

block-definition.s: 線（正方形） 一辺： %'d'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2) ); var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;
return new THREE.Vector3( x, y, z );

block.l: var deg= Math.PI/180; //obj.rotation.set(obj.rotation.x+_x*deg,obj.rotation.y+_y*deg,obj.rotation.z+_z*deg); obj.rotateX(x*deg); obj.rotateY(y*deg); obj.rotateZ(z*deg);

block-definition.s: ガイドグリッドを作る 大きさ: %'_s' ピッチ: %'_p'

block.l: //GridHelper(大きさ, １マスの大きさ) var grid = new THREE.GridHelper(_s, _p); //シーンオブジェクトに追加 scene.add(grid);

block-definition.s: %'obj' のクローン

block.l: var obj2 = obj.clone(); scene.add(obj2); return obj2;

block-definition.s: カメラ
カメラヘルパーを作る カメラ： %'light'
すべての要素を取得
ステージの %'n' 番目の要素を取得
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' に追加する
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' から削除する
%'obj' をステージに登録する
%'vec' の %'DIR' 座標

block.l: if(dir=="X"){ return vec.x; } if(dir=="Y"){ return vec.y; } if(dir=="Z"){ return vec.z; }

block-definition.s: カウンタ
%'obj' をステージから削除する
すべてをステージから削除する

block.l: var obj; while(scene.children.length){ obj = scene.children[0] scene.remove(obj); } scene.add(camera); controls.reset();

block-definition.s: サイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
コサイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
%'obj' の色を RGB %'r' %'g' %'b' にする

block.l: var col = new THREE.Color(r/255,g/255,b/255); if(obj.isLight){ obj.color = col; }else{ obj.material.color = col; };

block-definition.s: %'obj' の透明度を %'val' ％にする
%'obj' のざらつきを %'val' ％にする
%'obj' をワイヤーフレームにする／しない
%'obj' のテクスチャー画像を %'img' にする

block.l: var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); var mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial( { map: texture, } ); //console.log(mat); obj.material = mat;

block-definition.s: %'obj' のバンプマップを %'img' %'scale' にする

block.l: var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); obj.material.bumpMap = texture; obj.material.bumpScale = scale*0.01; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; console.log(obj.material);
var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); var mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial( { bumpMap: texture, bumpScale:scale*0.01, roughness:1, } ); obj.material = mat;

block-definition.s: %'obj' をコンソール出力する
点光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var lightHelper = new THREE.PointLightHelper( light, 1);//(光源,ヘルパーオブジェクトの大きさ) scene.add(lightHelper);

block-definition.s: 平行光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var LightHelper = new THREE.DirectionalLightHelper( light, 1); scene.add( LightHelper);

block-definition.s: 新規グループを作成

block.l: var group = new THREE.Group(); scene.add(group); return group;

block-definition.s: レイキャスター %'obj' から %'dir' 方向を探べる

block.l: //var raycaster = new THREE.Raycaster(obj.position, dir.normalize()); raycaster.set(obj.position,dir.normalize()); //const raycaster = new THREE.Raycaster(); //raycaster.setFromCamera(mouse, camera); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ // ぶつかったオブジェクトに対してなんかする //console.log(intersects); return intersects[0].object; }else{ return false; }

block-definition.s: %'obj' の位置を %'vec' にする
%'obj' の位置

block.l: var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldPosition(vec); return vec;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の前方向

block.l: var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldDirection(vec); return vec;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の位置を %'vec' ずつ変える

block.l: //console.log(vec); obj.position.x = obj.position.x + vec.x; obj.position.y = obj.position.y + vec.y; obj.position.z = obj.position.z + vec.z; //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(1,0,0), vec.x); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0), vec.y); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,0,1), vec.z); //obj.translateX(vec.x); //obj.translateY(vec.y); //obj.translateZ(vec.z);

block-definition.s: %'obj' の右方向 A

block.l: var vec1 = new THREE.Vector3(); var vec2 = new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0); obj.getWorldDirection(vec1); var vec3 = vec1.crossVectors(vec1,vec2); return vec3;

block-definition.s: %'vec' の %'n' 倍
%'obj' の向きを %'vec' （方向） に向ける

custom-block.s: %txt の向きを %txt （地点） に向ける

block-definition.s: %'obj' の向きを %'vec' （地点） に向ける
%'obj' の向きを %'vec' ずつ変える

block.l: var deg= Math.PI/180; obj.rotateX(vec.x*deg); obj.rotateY(vec.y*deg); obj.rotateZ(vec.z*deg);

block-definition.s: レイキャスター 画面内の %'x' %'y' を調べる

block.l: raycaster.setFromCamera(new THREE.Vector2(x,y), camera ); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ // ぶつかったオブジェクトに対してなんかする //console.log(intersects); return intersects[0].object; }else{ return false; }

block-definition.s: draw rect %'x' %'y' %'w' %'h'
clear canvas
drawmode %'mode'

input.options: source-over source-in source-out source-atop destination-over destination-in destination-out destination-atop lighter darken copy xor

block-definition.s: fillstyle %'r' %'g' %'b'
strokestyle %'r' %'g' %'b'
draw circle %'x' %'y' r: %'r'

block.l: ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(x, y, r,0, Math.PI*2); ctx.fill();

block-definition.s: drawLine %'x0' %'y0' %'x1' %'y1'

block.l: ctx.beginPath(); //ctx.lineWidth = 1; ctx.moveTo(x0, y0); ctx.lineTo(x1, y1); //ctx.closePath(); ctx.stroke();

block-definition.s: alpha %'val'
stroke weight %'val'
drawRect %'x' %'y' %'w' %'h'
drawText %'x' %'y' %'txt'
setFont %'size' %'font' %'align'
スプライト を整列させる
%'obj' のテクスチャ画像（陰なし）を %'img' にする

block.l: var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); //var mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial( { // emissiveMap: texture, // } ); var mat = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0xFFFFFF, map: texture, }); console.log(mat); obj.material = mat;

block-definition.s: %'obj' が影を落とす/落とさない
%'obj' が影を受ける/受けない

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: %'val' の小数点 %'fig' ケタ
